channel.title: [pk] pklocus requesting coder/developer [locus]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i952.photobucket.com/albums/ae4/FallenXan/Pklocus247.jpg[/img]
IF THIS IS ADVERTISING PLEASE TELL ME ILL REMOVE WHATEVER IS ADVERTISING THANKS.
Coder will receive: co-owner/coder and mod on forums and chatbox owner.
Pklocus server development team.
about me: im new to java coding/programing but im learning. so i am requesting a server development team/coders.
about the server: its small right now with up to 10 players, its vps hosted with vpsland.com 24.99$ a month.
goal: to have 30-50+ online active players 24/7 and have weekly updates
things to be coded: source needs to have a good pvp system such as artifacts and anti-null system. could use a new start place.
please add me on msn: rsbotsdownload@hotmail.com
sorry if this isnt very good, but im new to rsps and java programming and i realy need some help. thanks have a great afternoon
